Restricted  
NO.CAS-8(1)/96/Div.I(SPG) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING (I-III Floor), JANPATH BHAVAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated : 29/01/2011 
 
AVSEC Circular No.  05 / 2011 
 
Subject :  Permission for carriage of arms & ammunition by SPG personnel in   
                 hold baggage. 
 
 
  Notwithstanding anything contained in BCAS Circular No.44/2000 
dated 22/12/2000, BCAS Circular No.29/2002 dated 24.09.2002 and Circular 
No.17/2008 dated 26/12/2008, a copy of DGCA permit number 990-AA/ 2010,  
issued under reference No. 8/95/2005-IR dated 28-12-2010 regarding 
authorization to the Special Protection Group personnel  for carriage of arms and 
ammunition by air to/from any point  within India, is forwarded herewith for 
information and necessary action by all concerned. 
 
2. 
 This permit is valid till  31 /12 / 2011. 
 
 This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
Encl :      As above. 
 
 
 
( R.N.Dhoke, IPS ) 
Addl.Commissioner of Security(CA) 
 
 
Distribution : As per list attached.  
 
 
Copy for information also to:-   
 
The Director, Special Protection Group,  
9, Race Course Road, New Delhi.
